description:
We are using Grizzly release with vmwareapi ESXi compute driver. Network schema: nova-network with multi_host. Compute node located inside ESXi as was mentioned in OpenStack docs. 

We've faced with networking thoubles. Instance gets an IP address, but no ICMP, TCP, etc. connectivity.

On compute node nova-network creates bridges and vlan interfaces with mac-addreses differ than on private interface.

eth2       - 52:54:00:a2:41:df - private interface(vlan trunk)

br300    - fa:16:3e:5a:f3:79
vlan300 - fa:16:3e:5a:f3:79

Vmware vSwitch doesn't have CAM table (as real switch) and drops all packages with unknown destination mac-addresses.

SOLUTION: set on br300 and vlan300 mac-address from eth2

ip link set br300 address  52:54:00:a2:41:df
ip link set vlan300 address  52:54:00:a2:41:df

Please take look at my temporary patch for nova.
title: VMWARE vSwitch drops packages with differ mac-addresses

comments.content: Interesting patch, we've been telling people to use quantum/neutron for these kinds of problems in the near term. I'll have to see if someone can reproduce the failure.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hartsock

comments.content:
Shawn, is quantum(neutron) grizzly release supports ESXi with standard(or distributed) vSwitch?

We've tried, but decided that it only could work with nicira nvp. It should be able to manage vmware vswitch in some manner and we didn't find some code about vmware in Quantum(Neutron). Unfortunately it forced us to use grizzly+vmware with deprecated nova-network.

Thanks, Roman
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rsokolkov

comments.content:
Hi,
The general installation would be with Neutron and the the NVP instead of the traditional Nova network. I understand that the compute node is a VM that is running on the ESX. By default only traffic with the VM's MAC address can get to and from the VM. Would it be possible that you please try the following (without your patch): enable promiscuous mode and spoofing on the port of the compute node.
Thanks
Gary
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~garyk

comments.content:
Guys, my bad.

If turn ON promiscuous mode on private port group, all works like a charm.

Please close bug as invalid.

Thanks, Roman
